# RequestContentType enumeration

```csharp
public enum RequestContentType
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| URL | `0` | All parameters are sent as a query in the URL |
| FormData | `1` | Parameters are sent as form data in the request body (Incompatible with HttpGet) |
| JSON | `2` | Parameters are sent as JSON in the request body (Incompatible with HttpGet) |
